work_experience.description: Managed the Frontend Course, including participant selection, material curation, and organization on Microsoft Teams. Conducted interviews, created entrance exams, graded assignments, and provided support for lab work, certificate studies, and job searches, ensuring a comprehensive learning experience.

Designed and implemented functional automated tests for video analysis systems using Java, JUnit, and Selenium. Developed a web application for testing video analysis agents with Aurelia, and RESTful services for iOS player sessions. Created database models in MySQL and MongoDB, and configured Jenkins server for test execution.

Summary: Proficient in manufacturing applications with Microsoft's framework, emphasizing C#. Skilled in web development using .NET and MVC, engaging in both frontend and backend programming with C#, Javascript, HTML, and CSS. Experienced in managing databases, particularly SQL Server.

Managed website operations, executed web development using .NET framework, and engaged in full-stack programming with C#, JavaScript, HTML, and CSS. Proficiently handled SQL Server for database management.

education.description: Focus on Internet programming with Java framework, Javascript, HTML, and CSS. Learned procedural and object-oriented programming, management of relational databases, and object-oriented analysis and design.

Developed web applications using C# with a focus on object-oriented programming, MVC Core architecture, and unit testing with NUnit. Employed backend technologies such as Entity Framework Core for data access and RESTful-style WCF services. Utilized frontend technologies including JavaScript for programming, HTML for structuring, and CSS for layout design.

Implemented Java web development, utilizing Java SE 8 and Java EE 7 for backend tasks. Employed Javascript for frontend, structured HTML, and designed layouts using CSS. Utilized SQL with MySQL for databases. Engaged in test-driven development, undertaking e-learning and lectures for ISTQB certification preparation.

Studied WCF, .NET data access, and SQL Server maintenance. Developed service-oriented apps, configured .NET framework, and maintained SQL Server. Earned MCTS certifications in WCF, .NET data access, and SQL Server 2008 implementation and maintenance.
